alert.note: Alert for Central Aleutians (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 19 at 6:47PM AKDT until March 20 at 1:00AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM AKDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Westerly winds 50 to 60 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Adak Island. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 1 AM AKDT Monday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property, and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A potent North Pacific low will continue to lift across the Western Aleutians this evening. Winds, initially southerly, will shift out of the west in the evening hours. The westerly shift is expected to bring the strongest winds before they quickly diminish with the exiting low late tonight.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. Prepare for the possibility of widespread power outages. Use caution if you must drive.
